name: SET OF 12 BOLD Sterling Silver Hammered Bands Stackable Rings Sizes 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 half and q
description:
These sterling silver stackable rings look great together, mixed with other pieces that you can find in my store NadineJewelry.Com, or create a stunning bold statement by themselves. Each sterling band is carefully hammered with my hammer, creating facets that catch the light. DIMENSIONS: Silver Bands: each band is about 1.5mm wide before hammering, hammered, made of solid sterling silver. Total width of this stack of rings is approx 1 inch! This set of ring sis being created for you when you order. Please tell me your ring size in the message box at the checkout, or simply use the contact form. If you need help figuring out your ring size please visit http://www.bluenile.com/pdf/bluenile_ringsizer_copyright2008.pdf All my jewelry is handcrafted by me in my home studio, in The Netherlands and it is new, unworn. I work only with top quality materials (sterling silver and gemstones that I purchase from long established companies). My Warranty: All of my work is built to last at least a lifetime. If you have any problem with something purchased from me, as long as the damage is not due to intentional abuse, my warranty coves the repairs. Just contact me and be ready to pay the low shipping both ways - I cover the rest. It's as simple as that. I will ship my items properly sanitized and securely packaged. I ship right within 2 - 3 business days after receiving cleared payment ,via PRIORITY MAIL. My jewelry should arrive to you within 5 to 7 business days from the day of shipment. Of course, I appreciate your positive feedback:) Thank you so much for looking, Nadina:) @ NadineJewelry.Com
